title: When Hextech crate gives you a legacy skin for free

replies.body: Any word on when Hextech goes to NA servers?
its on now
why do people get all the good skins? I got headhunter yi and a ward skin {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Dino {{champion:150}} and a riggle ward for me :L
some nunu skin and the lux ward D:

Charred Maokai and the grave stone ward.
Literally the *only* ward skin I have. ;/

Dark Crystal Ryze and Mother Serpent Ward


i never play ryze tho and i leik my draven ward
You people are unbelievable... it's a free skin and you still complain. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

I don't complain about free skins.
I complain about RNGesus. ;p
I got a Spirit Guard Udyr shard, but I don't own the champion.
you must be the most luckiest man alive
I got a ward skin for a ward skin I already own (and a terrible Lux skin).
Let me guess, Commando?
Imperial. It's lackluster relative to my Sorceress, Spell Thief (mystery gift), and Star Guardian.
got primetime draven, second chest have the final boss veigar skin to unlock now :)
You lucky <bleep>. ;p

I was thinking as I opened the first skin box that I wanted primetime draven too, because draven is one of my favorite champions.

too bad the veigar skin takes like another 800 oranges, but worth it when I get to it, what about you? my third chest gave me oranges and a summoner's icon so not as great sadly (can't convert it q.q)
SSW Twitch, and Vandal Gragas on my smurf. Not even mad
Zombie ryze...
I'm sorry. I even payed for that skin and I ended up wishing I bought the pirate skin immediately afterwards :(
Ikr, i wonder if riot ever planes on remake old skins. I mean that one is just disgusting.
I think he is on the list for [a new model](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Champion/Champion_Updates), so hopefuly they will get to him sometime soon.
Niceeeeee. At least the taric rework is coming up real soon. Cant w8 for a epic surprise like poppy X3 !!!

Jailbreak Graves... now if it only came with his cigar....

I HAD TO {{champion:104}}

> [{quoted}](name=InHaruhiWeTrust,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0kaGoOeE,comment-id=003a,timestamp=2016-03-16T18:41:21.687+0000)
>
> i got
> http://www.leagueoflegendsskins.com/images/champions/splash/Nidalee_5.jpg
> {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

Niiiice!
I got the Poro Ward Skin. I don't see it on the store... is it anything special?
Poro Ward skins were released during Snowdown last year and are legacy ward skins. I got the underworld Poro ward skin.
Cool, thanks!
I want Judgement Kayle and Black Alistar :(

I enjoy my Silver Kayle from the old collectors edition box.  Not the prettiest or most fantastic skin, but its my rarest skin.    Sadly I don't really play Kayle that much  :(

Wonder if that skin will be available for people to get with hextech crafting.
What if... PAX SKINS! :O
No limited skins, including PAX and black alistar and such... Legacy are in there though
I know. That's why I said "What If?"
ah oki oki
Championship Thresh
https://wiki.teamfortress.com/w/images/2/24/Spy_mvm_loot_godlike03.wav?t=20131122055754

I got Deep One Kassadin and Zombie Ryze...

Not all blessings are as such...

http://i.imgur.com/ggxKzfk.png

It's not Hextech Annie, but omg so cool :D
Anyone else notice that on summoner profile it says you cant earn a box for 6 days after you get your first?  wtf is up with that?  I only recall them saying 4 per month, not 1 per week.

I think how it works is the beginning they give you all 4 at once, after that you restore 1 box per week.

So basically by the time you unlock all 4 boxes, you dont have to wait forever before the next batch.

I got Dark Candy {{champion:9}} for free, and then I bought some chests for fun and got:

{{champion:432}} <--I freaked out. I've wanted bard for so long, but I've never had the patience to reach 6k ip.

Vandal {{champion:79}} <-- and now I am feeding constantly trying to learn top lane gragas. :' (

So far I got Vandal Twitch, and then Red Baron Corki.

: D
I got some old ass sivir skin that looks like trash {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
i just got teemo
I got Final Boss Veigar for free from the chests.
Winged Xin Zhao, and a dragon slayer poro ward skin.
I got me that Dark Candy Fiddlesticks and the Sad Mummy Ward. Not too shabby, I ain't complaining
Got prototype Viktor heeeeeeck yessss.
